name: a deception in silver DEMO
description:
You, an eleven-year-old child prodigy,  stumble one lazy, grey Tuesday into a labyrinth  of monsters and secrets. Your primary goal? Retrieve your precious GLASS EYE.  

Oh, and don't get devoured. Your grandmum would like to see you home in one piece. 

DEMO: FULL GAME COMING SOON. Made in a 3-hour game jam.
